entry.title: [RBX7][DedicatedServers] - Rack R714B05
entry.content:
Dec 8, 10:52 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 08/12/2022 09:00 UTC
End Time : 08/12/2022 10:49 UTC
Root cause : cooling system malfunction
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Dec 8, 09:57 UTC
Identified - Start time : 08/12/2022 09:00 UTC
Service impact : Some servers in the rack R714B05 are no longer responding.
Root cause : cooling system malfunction
Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.

entry.title: [RBX3][DedicatedServers] - Rack 46F23 46F24 46F25
entry.content:
Dec 8, 10:17 UTC
Resolved - Our technical teams resolved the issue.
All impacted servers are operational.

Dec 8, 07:50 UTC
Update - Our technical teams continue to work on the remaining impacted servers.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

Dec 8, 04:40 UTC
Update - Update : All servers in rack 46F25 are reachable. Our teams are still working on the other racks.

Dec 8, 00:55 UTC
Update - Update : Our teams are still working on the impacted servers.

Dec 7, 20:04 UTC
Update - Update : The electrical fault has been corrected. Our teams have restored power to the impacted racks.
They will now take care of the servers that are still impacted.

Dec 7, 17:59 UTC
Update - Update : The problem that caused the incident has been corrected. Our teams are now replacing a electrical equipment that was impacted during the incident.

Dec 7, 16:46 UTC
Update - Service impact : All servers in racks 46F[23->25] and some servers in rack 46F20 are no longer responding.

Dec 7, 15:57 UTC
Update - Update : The operation to bring the system back into service is still in progress.

Dec 7, 14:35 UTC
Identified - Service impact : All servers in racks 46F[23->25] are no longer responding.
Root cause : Incident due to a problem with our cooling system.
Ongoing actions : The defective parts are being replaced by our teams.

Dec 7, 13:15 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 07/12/2022 13:00 UTC
Service impact : Some servers in racks 46F[23->25] are no longer responding.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.

entry.title: [BHS5][Dedicated Servers] - T05G21/T05G34/T06A03
entry.content:
Dec 8, 01:02 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 08/12/2022 00:56 UTC 
End Time : 08/12/2022 01:01 UTC 
Service impact : vRack was temporarily unavailable on racks T05G21, T05G34 and T06A03
Root cause : A network equipment caused the incident
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

entry.title: [BHS7][Dedicated Servers] - Rack B716A07
entry.content:
Dec 6, 08:25 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 06/12/2022 07:09 UTC
End Time : 06/12/2022 07:18 UTC
Root cause : The switch rebooted due to a kernel panic.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Dec 6, 07:25 UTC
Identified - Start time : 06/12/2022 07:09 UTC
Service impact : Public network on the rack B716A07 is unavailable.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.
